segment.source: Use the Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection portal
segment.target: Use the Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection portal

segment.source: Learn about the features on Windows Defender ATP portal, including how alerts work, and suggestions on how to investigate possible breaches and attacks.
segment.target: Learn about the features on Windows Defender ATP portal, including how alerts work, and suggestions on how to investigate possible breaches and attacks.

segment.source: Use the Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection portal
segment.target: Use the Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection portal

segment.source: Applies to:
segment.target: Applies to:

segment.source: Windows 10 Insider Preview Build 14332 or later
segment.target: Windows 10 Insider Preview Build 14332 or later

segment.source: Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection (Windows Defender ATP)
segment.target: Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection (Windows Defender ATP)

segment.source: [Some information relates to pre-released product which may be substantially modified before it's commercially released.
segment.target: [Some information relates to pre-released product which may be substantially modified before it's commercially released.

segment.source: Microsoft makes no warranties, express or implied, with respect to the information provided here.]
segment.target: Microsoft makes no warranties, express or implied, with respect to the information provided here.]

segment.source: A typical security breach investigation requires a member of a security operations team to:
segment.target: A typical security breach investigation requires a member of a security operations team to:

segment.source: View an alert on the Dashboard or Alerts queue
segment.target: View an alert on the Dashboard or Alerts queue

segment.source: Review the indicators of compromise (IOC) or indications of attack (IOAs)
segment.target: Review the indicators of compromise (IOC) or indications of attack (IOAs)

segment.source: Review a timeline of alerts, behaviors, and events from the machine
segment.target: Review a timeline of alerts, behaviors, and events from the machine

segment.source: Manage alerts, understand the threat or potential breach, collect information to support taking action, and resolve the alert
segment.target: Manage alerts, understand the threat or potential breach, collect information to support taking action, and resolve the alert

segment.source: Flowchart describing the four stages of investigation
segment.target: Flowchart describing the four stages of investigation

segment.source: Security operation teams can use Windows Defender ATP portal to carry out this end-to-end process without having to leave the portal.
segment.target: Security operation teams can use Windows Defender ATP portal to carry out this end-to-end process without having to leave the portal.

segment.source: Teams can monitor the overall status of enterprise endpoints from the Dashboard, gain insight on the various alerts, their category, when they were observed, and how long they’ve been in the network at a glance.
segment.target: Teams can monitor the overall status of enterprise endpoints from the Dashboard, gain insight on the various alerts, their category, when they were observed, and how long they’ve been in the network at a glance.

segment.source: In this section
segment.target: In this section

segment.source: Topic
segment.target: Topic

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: View the Dashboard
segment.target: View the Dashboard

segment.source: The Windows Defender ATP Dashboard provides a snapshot of your network.
segment.target: The Windows Defender ATP Dashboard provides a snapshot of your network.

segment.source: You can view aggregates of alerts, the overall status of the service of the endpoints on your network, investigate machines, files, and URLs, and see snapshots of threats seen on machines.
segment.target: You can view aggregates of alerts, the overall status of the service of the endpoints on your network, investigate machines, files, and URLs, and see snapshots of threats seen on machines.

segment.source: View and organize the Alerts queue
segment.target: View and organize the Alerts queue

segment.source: You can sort and filter alerts across your network, and drill down on individual alert queues such as new, in progress, or resolved queues.
segment.target: You can sort and filter alerts across your network, and drill down on individual alert queues such as new, in progress, or resolved queues.

segment.source: Investigate alerts
segment.target: Investigate alerts

segment.source: Investigate alerts in Windows Defender ATP which might indicate possible security breaches on endpoints in your organization.
segment.target: Investigate alerts in Windows Defender ATP which might indicate possible security breaches on endpoints in your organization.

segment.source: Investigate machines
segment.target: Investigate machines

segment.source: The Machines view shows a list of the machines in your network, the corresponding number of active alerts for each machine categorized by alert severity levels, as well as the number of threats.
segment.target: The Machines view shows a list of the machines in your network, the corresponding number of active alerts for each machine categorized by alert severity levels, as well as the number of threats.

segment.source: Investigate files
segment.target: Investigate files

segment.source: Investigate the details of a file associated with a specific alert, behavior, or event to help determine if the file exhibits malicious activities, identify the attack motivation, and understand the potential scope of the breach.
segment.target: Investigate the details of a file associated with a specific alert, behavior, or event to help determine if the file exhibits malicious activities, identify the attack motivation, and understand the potential scope of the breach.

segment.source: Investigate an IP address
segment.target: Investigate an IP address

segment.source: Examine possible communication between your machines and external internet protocol (IP) addresses.
segment.target: Examine possible communication between your machines and external internet protocol (IP) addresses.

segment.source: Investigate a domain
segment.target: Investigate a domain

segment.source: Investigate a domain to see if machines and servers in your enterprise network have been communicating with a known malicious domain.
segment.target: Investigate a domain to see if machines and servers in your enterprise network have been communicating with a known malicious domain.

segment.source: Manage alerts
segment.target: Manage alerts

segment.source: The Manage Alert menu on every alert lets you change an alert's status, resolve it, suppress it, or contribute comments about the alert.
segment.target: The Manage Alert menu on every alert lets you change an alert's status, resolve it, suppress it, or contribute comments about the alert.
